slides.title: Physics Basics
slides.content:
**Newton's Laws, Speed=Distance/Time**
**Energy:** Kinetic, Potential, Heat, Light
**Electricity:** AC/DC, Conductors/Insulators
**Light:** Reflection, Refraction, Speed: 3×10⁸ m/s
**Sound:** Needs medium, Speed in air: 343 m/s

slides.title: Chemistry & Biology
slides.content:
**Chemistry:** Acids (pH<7), Bases (pH>7), H₂O, NaCl, CO₂
**Biology:** 206 bones, Heart (circulatory), Lungs (respiratory)
**Diseases:** TB, Malaria (communicable), Diabetes (non-communicable)
**Vitamins:** A-eyes, B-energy, C-immunity, D-bones

question.questionText: What is the chemical formula of common salt?
question.explanation: NaCl (Sodium Chloride) is the chemical formula for common salt.
